title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 79-5.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 79-5.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this subpart
(a) Acceptable accrediting agency shall mean
an organization accepted by the department as a reliable authority for the
purpose of accreditation at the postsecondary level, applying its criteria for
granting accreditation in a fair, consistent, and nondiscriminatory manner, such as an agency regognized for these purposes by the United States Department
of Education. (b) Equivalent shall
mean substantially the same, as determined by the depertment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
79-5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
